experience.description: As the sole front-end developer, I independently developed the entire product for this NFT marketplace. The platform allows users to migrate NFTs from various networks to BTC, buy and sell them, view statistics, and analyze collections. I was responsible for all effects and styles and actively participated in the design development for this project.

At Evolv Technology, a provider of AI-enabled touchless security screening systems, I contributed to the development of their advanced security solutions. Additionally, I worked on the development of their mobile application as a React Native developer, separate from the website.

At Oasis Pro Marketplace, I served as a Full Stack Developer on a crypto project, contributing to the development of an investment platform. My responsibilities included working on both the front-end and back-end aspects of the project, ensuring seamless integration and functionality.

It was an exciting startup that developed a crypto fund for profitable investments. As a developer, my role involved connecting the client's wallet, providing statistics and graphs, integrating the website with smart contracts, and enabling cryptocurrency operations such as minting, redeeming, swapping, staking, and farming.

Working at a company that developed an online casino platform was an exciting and stimulating experience. As a front-end developer, I had the opportunity to create engaging interfaces for the website where the casino games were integrated.

Contributed to the development of a cutting-edge e-commerce platform built with Vue.js. Responsibilities included designing and implementing interactive features, optimizing website performance, and ensuring cross-browser compatibility.

education.institution: Lviv Cooperative College of Economics and Law
Lviv University of Trade and Economics
